headline: Williams-Sonoma (NYSE:WSM) Sees 16% Weekly Drop Amid Strong Earnings Growth
summary: Williams-Sonoma (NYSE:WSM) recently expanded its Pottery Barn collaboration with LoveShackFancy while gaining inclusion in indices such as the S&P 500 and FTSE All-World. Despite reporting strong earnings growth and a new quarterly dividend, the company's stock fell 16% last week. The decline coincided with a major market sell-off tied to trade tensions and tariff announcements, contributing to investor anxiety across sectors. The Dow and Nasdaq saw decreases, entering correction and bear...

headline: Why Williams-Sonoma Stock Was Wilting This Week
summary: According to data compiled by S&P Global Market Intelligence, Williams-Sonoma (NYSE: WSM) shares were weakening considerably -- as of early morning Friday they were down nearly 13% week to date.  As pointed out by an analyst tracking the company, it's very exposed to the risk posed by the tariffs freshly enacted by the U.S. government.  Williams-Sonoma is a storied home furnishings and kitchen goods retailer that, like many of its peers, relies significantly on imports for its product line-up.
